title: Financial Java API
description: Spring Boot-based banking service architecture with microservices design, providing robust API endpoints for financial operations. Implements best practices for security, scalability, and maintainability.

title: Financial Insights with Power BI
description: Full-stack development project integrating Power BI analytics for banking data visualization. Provides comprehensive financial insights through interactive dashboards and real-time data analysis.

title: End-to-End Data Engineering
description: Comprehensive data engineering exploration project implementing ETL pipelines, data warehousing, and analytics workflows using Python and modern data engineering tools.

title: Express REST API Boilerplate
description: Production-ready Node.js REST API framework with Express.js, featuring authentication, error handling, logging, and best practices for building scalable backend services.

title: Interactive Resume
description: JavaScript-based interactive resume showcasing modern web development skills with dynamic content loading and responsive design.

title: Java Programming Projects
description: Collection of Java programming projects demonstrating object-oriented programming principles, data structures, algorithms, and software design patterns.
